## runpodctl start pod

start a pod

### Synopsis

start a pod from runpod.io

```
runpodctl start pod [podId] [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --bid float32    bid per gpu for spot price
      --gpuCount int   number of GPUs to request (default 1)
  -h, --help           help for pod
```
